definition: Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

sentences.english: AIM To investigate the protective effect of bupleurum polyclonum on acute liver ischemic injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中药柴胡对急性肝脏缺血性损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the protective effect of Minor Radix Bupleuri Decoction on hepatic injury due to alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究加味小柴胡汤对酒精所致肝损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Bupleurum Chinense Emulsion has a marked suppressive effects on the inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 结论柴胡静脉乳剂具有抑制炎症反应的作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To observe the anti - infection and anti - pyretic effect in vivo of Minor Decoction of Bupleurum ( Xiaochaihu Tang ) .
sentences.chinese: 目的观察中药制剂小柴胡汤体内抗感染及解热作用。

sentences.english: Objective To assess environment quality of GAP base of Radix Bupleuri from Songxian in Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 目的河南省嵩县柴胡种植基地生态环境质量进行评价。

sentences.english: To explore the effect and advantage of Bupleurum Citrus Aurtantium Liqi Decoction from Laos Trauma Section on chest sprain.
sentences.chinese: 探讨柴胡枳壳理气汤对治疗胸胁挫伤的疗效及优势。

sentences.english: Conclusion This study provided a basis for the quality control of Xiaochaihu granules.
sentences.chinese: 结论本研究为小柴胡冲剂的质量控制提供了依据。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the extraction technology for the total saponin of Radix Bupleuri.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察柴胡中总皂苷的最佳提取工艺。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of modified Chai Hu Long Mu decoction in the treatment of neurasthenia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察加味柴胡龙牡汤治疗神经衰弱的临床疗效。

sentences.english: AIM To investigate the effect of crude extract of Bupleurum smithii (B. smithii) on the complement system.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究柴胡粗提物对补体系统的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anti-inflammatory effects of Bupleurum Chinense Emulsion.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究柴胡静脉乳剂的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To separate saikosaponins from Bupleurun Chinese DC.
sentences.chinese: 目的从北柴胡中分离出柴胡总皂苷。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To separate saikosaponins from Bupleurun Chinese DC.
sentences.chinese: 目的从北柴胡中分离出柴胡总皂苷。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of Radix Bupleuri on the central monoamine neurotransmitters of rats with Liver-qi Stagnation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索柴胡对肝郁证大鼠中枢神经递质的作用。

definition: dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
